amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate the ability of Fannie Mae, Freddie Mac, and the Federal Home Loan Bank Board, to borrow from the Treasury.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 109-254 toeliminate the ability of Fannie Mae, Freddie Mac, and the Federal Home Loan Bank Board to borrow from the Treasury.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Paul amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 47 - 371 (Roll no. 544).
